title: How good will be Janna in S7?
body:
Hi o/
Honestly I think Janna will be extremely good in S7 since 'Assassin will be META' and those new support items gosh they suit her perfectly.
What is your thought?
Janna=FreeELO

replies.body: janna will always be free elo
confirmed by riot, janna kept op on purpose
When is she not top tier?

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EkXjI8E5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-28T19:48:37.746+0000)
>
> When is she not top tier?

That month every year that they buff Sona, Janna suddenly falls, but then they go back and say "never mind, sona you cant be better than janna, fk off you musical bitch." ;~;
Are there going to be adcs still in the game? Yes? Then Janna will still be broken.
She's going to blow..... the wind at you o.o
